div.div: Wabash College vs. College of Wooster
at Wooster, Ohio | John P. Papp Stadium

tr.td: Wabash wins the toss, defers to the second half.
Ian MacDougall kickoff 65 yards to the WOO0, touchback.
Richard Barnes pass complete to Keir Pace for 6 yards to the WOO31 (Denzel Wilkins).
Richard Barnes pass incomplete to Keir Pace, dropped pass.
Richard Barnes pass incomplete to Darrian Owens.
Tyler Gerwig punt 34 yards to the WABF35, fair catch by Houston Hodges.
Michael Putko sacked for loss of 7 yards to the WABF28 (Cody Daniel).
